text: is it possible to make content smart in custom modules?
Not at the moment. Though I believe this is on HS' roadmap
The standard rich text module does allow it, but if used in a custom module you can't.

you may be able to make it smart in a way by using the Developer Info to do some if statements:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/how-to-use-developer-info-on-cos-pages>
Also custom Global modules can use smart content
Hi I am working on implementing an automated RSS email from an external blog.  I am unable to target the featured image directly using the provided HubL tags available in the Email editor.

After reading this article, I am hoping for a work around.  <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cos-general/how-do-i-add-an-rss-feed-to-one-of-my-HubSpot-pagesPlease> note: the RSS Listing module won't show featured images from an external blog RSS feed.
Since this is an email that I would like to automate I am hoping to not use Python or JS to convert/parse the RSS to JSON

Hi, anyone know if I can get the avatar of company with this code?
`{% set company = crm_object("company", contact.associatedcompanyid, "avatar") %}`
if `avatar` is a property on the contact, yes
yes, I think that should work. Any property on the contact can be retrieved, just not associations
is not a property of contact, I want the property of company but I can't get the logo of company
Hi does anyone know of a conditional to check if the page template type is a landing page?
